title: Bike Volume - Manual Counts
description:
A. SUMMARY 
Bicycle counts (volume) from 2009-2017, with the exception of 2012 when counts were not collected.

B. METHODOLOGY  
Manually updated

C. UPDATE FREQUENCY  
Annually in the fall, counts are collected the second week of September in coordination with the National Bicycle and Pedestrian Documentation Project. 

D. OTHER CRITICAL INFO  
A bicycle count value of “-1” indicates a null value (bicycle count data was not collected at this location for that year). Bike counts for 2012 are not included in this file, as they are not available/unable to be located. One empty feature from the original “citywide_manual_bicycle_count_locations” (feature 50) was deleted.

columns.name: OBJECTID
columns.description: Automatically generated system id

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: A unique id for each intersection location

columns.name: LOCATION
columns.description: Intersection street names

columns.name: NODELAYER
columns.description: Whether the observation location is an intersection or a street end

columns.name: CNN
columns.description: The unique street intersection central network node number

columns.name: TIME
columns.description: Whether the observation was logged in the AM or PM

columns.name: YR2006_PM
columns.description: Bike count for the year of 2006, PM

columns.description: Bike count for the year of 2007, PM

columns.description: Bike count for the year of 2013, PM

columns.name: YR2011PADJ
columns.description: 2011 was a departure year from the methodology used since 2006 in that they were counted in September rather than August; “yr2011_PM” represents the total counts observed September, and “yr2011pAdj” applies an adjustment ratio to translate the September 2011 volume to an August 2011 to compare “apples to apples” to the previous years

columns.description: Automatically generated system id

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was last processed

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was loaded into the Open Data Portal

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: Neighborhood associated with the midpoint  or centroid of the geographic feature

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: Current supervisor district associated with the midopint or centroid of the geographic feature

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
